thread.title: Side judge who missed clock runoff suspended 1 game
thread.title_full: Side judge who missed clock runoff suspended 1 game

title: Side judge who missed clock runoff suspended 1 game
text: > Pennsylvania Side judge who missed clock runoff suspended 1 game FILE - In this Oct. 9, 2011, file photo, side judge Rob Vernatchi (75) watches before an NFL football game between the Houston Texans and the Oakland Raiders in Houston. The NFL on Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015, has suspended Vernatchi for one game on for not managing the clock properly in the fourth quarter of Pittsburgh's game at San Diego on Monday night, Oct. 12. (AP Photo/Dave Einsel, File)
